item.title: Pharrell Williams - Happy - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Happy by Pharrell Williams from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: B♭, C, Cm7, D♭maj7, E♭, F.

item.title: Pharrell Williams - Happy - Simplified - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Happy by Pharrell Williams from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: C, D7, Dm, E♭, G.
